desc: Co-creator of open source project: Eloqua Speech Listening App

Integration with thirty-party APIs and cloud platform like Firebase
Developed and submitted analytical reports for corporate overseas projects
Integrated demands of foreign customers with Chinese government regulations and market specifities

Developed and administered English project contracts with overseas business partners
Drafted business plans for corporate funding campaigns
Facilitated communication between domestic and overseas staff
